body.name: Kolcraft Cloud Plus Lightweight Easy Fold Compact Toddler Stroller and Baby Stroller for Travel, Large Storage Basket, Multi-Position Recline, Convenient One-hand Fold, 13 lbs - Slate Gray
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 1 hr 19 mins

features: ULTRA-LIGHTWEIGHT: Travel friendly lightweight stroller (only 12.87 lbs), perfect for traveling and day trips. Disney Size Approved! The assembled dimensions are 17.6 x 29.9 x 41.7 inches
EXTENDED CANOPY AND SUN PROTECTION: Three-tier, extended canopy for maximum sun coverage. A peek-a-boo window so you can easily check on your baby while traveling and on the go
EASY ONE-HAND FOLD: Convenient one-hand, self-standing fold, perfect for car travel and vacations. Folded Dimensions: 18" W x 12" d x 34" h. All-terrain wheels and front suspension for a smooth ride
RECLINING SEAT: Reclining seat offers 5-point safety restraint system and accommodates child up to 50 pounds. (Stroller seat does not recline completely flat). Floor to Seat Distance: 14.5"
ROOMY STORAGE: Large, easy-access storage basket holds all baby's gear. Removable child tray with drink holder. Parent tray holds two water bottles and extra storage area makes it easy to travel
body.description: This best-selling Kolcraft lightweight baby stroller is designed for families on the go and is only 12.87 bs which makes it perfect for travel around your neighborhood, across town, or while on vacation! Parents love the multi-position reclining seat so baby stays comfortable during day trips or while traveling. Plus, a large, easy-access storage basket keeps all of babys necessities nearby, and the parent tray includes two drink holders and a separate roomy storage area for your items. The three-tier, extended canopy provides extra sun coverage and a peek-a-boo window let's you easily check on your child while on the go. All-terrain wheels and front suspension give your little rider a smooth ride and the 5-point safety harness can be adjusted as baby grows. The convenient child tray with drink holder is removable for easy access to the seat. A convenient one-hand compact fold lets you easily store the stroller and a self-standing fold helps keep the infant stroller within easy reach for your next strolling adventure! One-Year Manufacturer Warranty included. Maximum child weight: 50 lbs. Disney Size Approved!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PREMIUM FEATURES ULTRA-LIGHTWEIGHT Perfect for traveling and day trips with a compact fold and lightweight design (only 11.8lbs!) SELF-STANDING FOLD Convenient one-hand and self-standing fold EASY TO ASSEMBLE Easy to assemble in a few simple steps! EASY-ACCESS STORAGE Large, easy-access storage basket holds all baby's necessities MULTI-POSITION RECLINING SEAT Multi-position reclining seat keeps child comfortable (DOES NOT recline completely flat) CONVENIENT TRAYS Parent tray with two drink holders and extra storage area and removable child tray with dual cup & juice box holder COMFORT & SAFETY Adjustable 5-point safety harness along with all-terrain wheels and front suspension make for a smooth ride THREE-TIER CANOPY The three-tier, extended canopy offers maximum sun coverage. The peek-a-boo window expands and then tucks away when not needed

SPECIFICATIONS RECOMMENDED USE Use only once the child is able to sit up unassisted & has full head and neck control. Stroller NOT compatible with Infant Car Seats MAXIMUM CHILD WEIGHT 50 Lbs (Max Height of 40 Inches) STROLLER WEIGHT 12.87 Lbs SEAT WIDTH 12.25 in FLOOR TO SEAT DISTANCE 14.5 in ASSEMBLED DIMENSIONS 17.6" w x 29.9" d x 41.7" h FOLDED DIMENSIONS 18" w x 12" d x 34" h INFANT CAR SEATS INFANT CAR SEATS CANNOT BE USED WITH THIS STROLLER *IMPORTANT* COLOR OF STROLLER PARTS MAY VARY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight, lots of shade.
reviews.reviewText: We bought this stroller for our Disney vacation. All we had was a crappy hand-me-down umbrella stroller so this was a nice affordable upgrade. It has lots of pros and cons. I overall love it because it’s crazy lightweight and stands up on its own while closed. It’s very easy to move around and has cup holders for everyone and a snack tray. My son can easily climb in and out of it with the tray on but the tray also easily comes off. It has a decent recline for sleepy kids and lastly it has really good shade cover which was the biggest reason I bought it. Now for the cons, yes, it has a 5 point harness but I don’t totally love the hardware they used. However, it works well enough so we’ll just call it meh. The shade cover when fully pulled back kind of gets in the way of the drink holders but we’ll usually have it down so I’m not super worried. I wish the cup holders were a bit bigger especially for the child tray as his 360 doesn’t fit well in there. Lastly, we have NOT found this to be an easy one handed open and close. At minimum you need to add a foot to help it out. I think it’s something about the wheels not lining up right that makes it a little clunky when trying to close it. Also weird note, you have to use the locking piece on the side and the stroller actually folds up tighter than the locking mechanism allows. I found that odd.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little stroller
reviews.reviewText: **UPDATE: I changed the review to 5 stars. I still really like this stroller and I use it almost every day out in my back yard. I've used it on regular walks, at the store, and as i said, the boardwalk, along with my yard and in my stone driveway. It maneuvers just fine and has held up great, though I don't abuse my strollers. I don't really fold this up much anymore because I use it daily, so the fact that I can't fold it one handed just is so minor for me. Still completely recommend this stroller.So far I have only used this twice and I love it. Its exactly what I wanted. I wanted it because its more than an umbrella stroller but not a heavy full size stroller. Its very light weight and folds pretty compact, easy to fit in any trunk or back seat. Other reviews said that this stroller was hard to maneuver and was very hard hitting on any kind of bump even the tiny cracks in the sidewalk. I have not experienced this issue whatsoever. We used it on the boardwalk and I also pushed it around my yard today in my stone driveway and in the grass and it did perfectly fine. Some said their kids were being jolted forward at every bump, again we have not experienced this at all on either terrain type. The basket is big enough to throw in a sweatshirt or 2 and small diaper bag or purse and some toys. Thats what I wanted. The only thing I had to knock some stars off for was the ease of folding. Could be because its brand new that its just stiff, but i am unable to fold it one handed with ease. I have to lift up on the child tray often to get it to close and the wheels don't always fall into position to provide a full fold without manually turning them. It is however, easy to unfold one handed so this issue is definitely minor, at least for us. Overall I completely recommend this stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: It's a great stroller, easy to assemble and lightweight. I needed a stroller because I babysit my niece (18 months old) a few days a week (we love our walks). It's easy to open, but closing the stroller, you must make sure the front wheels are aligned properly outwards so that it folds easily. If the front wheels are not outward, it will not fully close. Other than that, which isn't that huge of a deal, it's a great stroller at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and glides well
reviews.reviewText: I love this stroller due to it being a perfect size and weight to store it in the truck. I walk comfortable and so does my son while he is in it. He is a very tallToddler and it works way better than what I had

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good all arounder
reviews.reviewText: We got this after not being happy with the weight or mobility of our unnecessarily expensive maxi cosi infant travel systemat $60 on sale, this Kolcraft is a no brainer! it folds easily, it's compact, there's 3 (unfortunately small) cup holders, the bottom storage can hold a medium sized baby bag, and it's very light weight for the sizemy only nitpicks are that the vent on the top of the cover cannot be closed, it's a permanent mesh net so we had to cover it with a shirt or something else when it's too sunnyalso the cup holders are very very small, they could have made them wider because it's nearly useless for anything other than small/regular coffee cups and most baby/toddler cups cannot fit eitherlastly, i've seen comparably sized strollers that can flatten so the kids can get some sleepi think that would have been a great addition because the angle it can currently go doesn't seem too comfortableassembly was not as easy as other strollers, especially the wheels which really aren't made to be taken apart againeither way, if you want a cheap easy to use compact stroller, this is it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great strong stroller
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is one of the best strollers it’s pretty light to carry and is able to take my toddler for long walks without any problems. I highly recommend and it’s affordable as well.
La he traído por caminos empedrados y no se ah maltratado nada, muy resistente y cómoda para mi niña de dos años.

La compré por la charola y portavasos pero los portavasos son muy chicos . No caben muchos vasos. Y se reclina muy poco.Tampoco es fácil de limpiar. El color se ensucia muy fácil y no se puede quitar el forro para limpiar.De ahí en mas, es ligera, y práctica. Buen espacio de la canastilla inferior.
Quiero que me agan el rembolso está muy chica la carreola no es lo que esperaba y no me permite la plataforma
